description: This is an HTML file for a web-based database viewer interface. It includes structure, styles, and client-side scripts to browse databases, tables, and view table data interactively.
external_files: None explicitly referenced within the file, but scripts fetch from API endpoints such as /api/databases, /api/{db}/tables, /api/{db}/tables/{tableName}/data

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases from server and renders them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refresh button handler to reload databases list, resets current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database's table list.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and renders tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for a selected table and renders it in tabular form.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs HTML table from data and inserts into page.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual cell values, handles objects, long text, and nulls.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for viewing full data.

search-terms: API endpoints for database, tables, data
